name: CFC.nnnorm_nnrpow
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁸ : NonUnitalNormedRing A
inst✝⁷ : StarRing A
inst✝⁶ : NormedSpace Real A
inst✝⁵ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝⁴ : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝³ : PartialOrder A
inst✝² : StarOrderedRing A
inst✝¹ : NonnegSpectrumClass Real A
inst✝ : NonUnitalIsometricContinuousFunctionalCalculus Real A IsSelfAdjoint
a : A
r : NNReal
hr : LT.lt 0 r
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (NNNorm.nnnorm (HPow.hPow a r)) (HPow.hPow (NNNorm.nnnorm a) ↑r)
decl:
lemma nnnorm_nnrpow (a : A) {r : ℝ≥0} (hr : 0 < r) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) :
    ‖a ^ r‖₊ = ‖a‖₊ ^ (r : ℝ) :=
  NNReal.monotone_nnrpow_const r |>.monotoneOn _ |>.nnnorm_cfcₙ _ _

name: CFC.norm_nnrpow
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁸ : NonUnitalNormedRing A
inst✝⁷ : StarRing A
inst✝⁶ : NormedSpace Real A
inst✝⁵ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝⁴ : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝³ : PartialOrder A
inst✝² : StarOrderedRing A
inst✝¹ : NonnegSpectrumClass Real A
inst✝ : NonUnitalIsometricContinuousFunctionalCalculus Real A IsSelfAdjoint
a : A
r : NNReal
hr : LT.lt 0 r
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (Norm.norm (HPow.hPow a r)) (HPow.hPow (Norm.norm a) ↑r)
decl:
lemma norm_nnrpow (a : A) {r : ℝ≥0} (hr : 0 < r) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) :
    ‖a ^ r‖ = ‖a‖ ^ (r : ℝ) :=
  congr(NNReal.toReal $(nnnorm_nnrpow a hr ha))

name: CFC.nnnorm_sqrt
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁸ : NonUnitalNormedRing A
inst✝⁷ : StarRing A
inst✝⁶ : NormedSpace Real A
inst✝⁵ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝⁴ : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝³ : PartialOrder A
inst✝² : StarOrderedRing A
inst✝¹ : NonnegSpectrumClass Real A
inst✝ : NonUnitalIsometricContinuousFunctionalCalculus Real A IsSelfAdjoint
a : A
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (NNNorm.nnnorm (CFC.sqrt a)) (NNReal.sqrt (NNNorm.nnnorm a))
decl:
lemma nnnorm_sqrt (a : A) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : ‖sqrt a‖₊ = NNReal.sqrt ‖a‖₊ := by
  rw [sqrt_eq_nnrpow, NNReal.sqrt_eq_rpow]
  exact nnnorm_nnrpow a (by norm_num) ha

name: CFC.norm_sqrt
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁸ : NonUnitalNormedRing A
inst✝⁷ : StarRing A
inst✝⁶ : NormedSpace Real A
inst✝⁵ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝⁴ : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝³ : PartialOrder A
inst✝² : StarOrderedRing A
inst✝¹ : NonnegSpectrumClass Real A
inst✝ : NonUnitalIsometricContinuousFunctionalCalculus Real A IsSelfAdjoint
a : A
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (Norm.norm (CFC.sqrt a)) (Norm.norm a).sqrt
decl:
lemma norm_sqrt (a : A) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : ‖sqrt a‖ = Real.sqrt ‖a‖ := by
  simpa using congr(NNReal.toReal $(nnnorm_sqrt a ha))

name: CFC.nnnorm_rpow
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁶ : NormedRing A
inst✝⁵ : StarRing A
inst✝⁴ : NormedAlgebra Real A
inst✝³ : PartialOrder A
inst✝² : StarOrderedRing A
inst✝¹ : NonnegSpectrumClass Real A
inst✝ : IsometricContinuousFunctionalCalculus Real A IsSelfAdjoint
a : A
r : Real
hr : LT.lt 0 r
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (NNNorm.nnnorm (HPow.hPow a r)) (HPow.hPow (NNNorm.nnnorm a) r)
decl:
lemma nnnorm_rpow (a : A) {r : ℝ} (hr : 0 < r) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) :
    ‖a ^ r‖₊ = ‖a‖₊ ^ r := by
  lift r to ℝ≥0 using hr.le
  rw [← nnrpow_eq_rpow, ← nnnorm_nnrpow a]
  all_goals simpa

name: CFC.norm_rpow
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁶ : NormedRing A
inst✝⁵ : StarRing A
inst✝⁴ : NormedAlgebra Real A
inst✝³ : PartialOrder A
inst✝² : StarOrderedRing A
inst✝¹ : NonnegSpectrumClass Real A
inst✝ : IsometricContinuousFunctionalCalculus Real A IsSelfAdjoint
a : A
r : Real
hr : LT.lt 0 r
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (Norm.norm (HPow.hPow a r)) (HPow.hPow (Norm.norm a) r)
decl:
lemma norm_rpow (a : A) {r : ℝ} (hr : 0 < r) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) :
    ‖a ^ r‖ = ‖a‖ ^ r :=
  congr(NNReal.toReal $(nnnorm_rpow a hr ha))
